bwwExcerpt: Hall's acting is perfectly decent, but she nonetheless may have been miscast. Despite posturing meekness and "purity," there's something about the star's worldliness - not to mention her 5-foot-9 frame - that makes the character's authenticity suspect even before she goes off the rails (literally, fighting her way off a crowded subway car because she can't breathe)...it's clear director Lyndsey Turner put lot of work into all the little details of "Machinal," with the right mix of star power and
